item.title: 卡塔尔被视为防止南非天然气危机的液化天然气供应商
item.description: 卡塔尔是向南非供应液化天然气的主要候选国，因为电力公司 Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. 和 Sasol Ltd. 正在合作，争取在 2027 年南非主要天然气供应中断之前从新的来源获得这种燃料。【原文：Qatar is a leading candidate to supply liquefied natural gas to South Africa as power utility Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. and Sasol Ltd. collaborate to get the fuel from new sources before its main supply drops off in 2027.】

item.title: Trafigura 准备将首席执行官职位移交给天然气公司总裁理查德-霍尔特姆
item.description: Trafigura 集团正准备向天然气、电力和可再生能源负责人理查德-霍尔特姆（Richard Holtum）移交领导权，由他接替杰里米-威尔（Jeremy Weir）担任新的首席执行官，后者将继续担任这家大宗商品贸易巨头的董事长。【原文：Trafigura Group is preparing for a leadership handover to gas, power and renewables head Richard Holtum as its new chief executive officer, replacing Jeremy Weir who will stay on as chairman of the commodity trading giant.】

item.title: Northvolt 在资金紧张的情况下仍创下新的电池里程碑
item.description: Northvolt AB 公司位于瑞典的主要工厂的锂离子电池芯产量创下新高，尽管该公司为解决资金短缺问题而缩减了部分业务。【原文：Northvolt AB has hit a new high for the production of lithium-ion battery cells at its main plant in Sweden, even as the company scales back some operations to address a financing crunch.】

item.title: Macklem 警告说，人工智能可能会通过促进需求来推高价格
item.description: 加拿大央行行长蒂夫-马克莱姆警告说，人工智能技术可能会在短期内增加通胀压力以及价格和劳动力波动。【原文：Bank of Canada Governor Tiff Macklem warned that artificial intelligence technologies may add to inflationary pressures as well as price and labor volatility in the short run.】

item.title: 星展银行称已向陷入困境的孟加拉国立法者举旗示警
item.description: 星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）表示，它对孟加拉国的一名前立法者提出了警告，该立法者拥有一个价值 2.65 亿美元的房地产王国，据说还从新加坡银行借了钱。【原文：DBS Group Holdings Ltd. said it raised flags about a former lawmaker in Bangladesh who has amassed a $265 million real estate empire and reportedly borrowed money from the Singapore bank.】

item.title: 身价 150 亿美元的哥伦比亚家族公布更多美国基金赌注
item.description: 世界上最富有的家族之一披露了超过 10 亿美元的私募股权投资的更多细节，该家族继续扩大其财富来源领域以外的持股。【原文：One of the world’s richest families disclosed additional details on more than $1 billion of private equity investments as it continues to expand holdings beyond the sector that made its fortune.】

item.title: 尼日利亚称 "系统问题 "导致储蓄债券推迟支付票息
item.description: 尼日利亚当局将向储蓄债券认购者支付票息的新一轮延迟归咎于系统和处理问题。【原文：Nigerian authorities have blamed a new delay in coupon payments to savings bond subscribers on system and processing issues.】

item.title: 波音为长期罢工做好准备，"千兆经济 "为工人带来影响力
item.description: 在波音公司位于西雅图的大型飞机制造中心，勒紧裤腰带的大幕已经拉开，这家飞机制造商和其工厂的工人们正在解决一场考验双方决心的劳资纠纷。【原文：Around Boeing Co.’s vast aircraft manufacturing hub in Seattle, the great belt tightening has begun as the planemaker and its factory workers settle in for a labor dispute that will test the resolve of both sides.】

item.title: 欧盟新财政规则与旧账难题
item.description: 欧盟的新债务规则旨在采取足够严厉的措施来促进财政整顿，但又不会严厉到无法实现的地步。彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）的债务模型显示，法国、意大利和西班牙目前的财政计划都远未达到欧盟的最新要求。启示：要完全遵守新规定，可能需要进行整合，而这将极难实现。新框架比上一个框架有所改进，但最严格的是【原文：The European Union’s new debt rules aim to be tough enough to spur fiscal rectitude, but not so tough as to be unachievable. Running current financial plans through Bloomberg Economics debt models suggests that neither France, Italy nor Spain are anywhere near complying with the EU’s latest demands. The takeaway: adhering fully to the new regulation is likely to require consolidations that will be extremely difficult to deliver. item.title: 苹果大获全胜，华尔街指数交易额达 2500 亿美元
item.description: 在 "三重巫术 "交易事件来临之际，指数追踪基金将对 2,500 亿美元的股票进行重新洗牌，华尔街本周的交易活动在一片欢呼声中结束。【原文：An action-packed week on Wall Street ends with a bang as index-tracking funds are set to reshuffle $250 billion of shares, just as a “triple witching” trading event hits.】

item.title: 中国预算支出下滑加剧，经济前景堪忧
item.description: 在地方政府卖地收入空前减少的情况下，中国的广泛预算支出以更快的速度缩减，这对于一个急需财政支持的经济体来说是一个令人担忧的信号。【原文：China’s broad budget expenditure shrank at a faster clip amid an unprecedented drop in income earned by local governments from land sales, an alarming sign for an economy desperately in need of fiscal support.】

item.title: 中国青年失业率在经济放缓中升至今年新高
item.description: 由于经济疲软，劳动力市场面临严峻的前景，中国青年失业率连续第二个月上升，达到今年以来的最高水平。【原文：China’s youth unemployment rate rose for the second straight month to its highest level this year as the labor market faces a challenging outlook due to a weakening economy.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。美联储大幅减息后的市场亢奋情绪正在消退，日本央行避免了冲击，梅赛德斯-奔驰因中国困境而暴跌。以下是交易员们正在谈论的话题。【原文：Good morning. The market euphoria that followed the Fed’s big cut is fading, the Bank of Japan avoids a shock and Mercedes-Benz tumbles amid China woes. Here’s what traders are talking about. — David Goodman】

item.title: 德国部长表示有望为汽车制造商提供更多援助
item.description: 德国经济部长罗伯特-哈贝克（Robert Habeck）提出了为德国汽车制造商提供更多支持的想法，并将于周一在柏林与汽车制造商高管举行会谈，讨论如何应对这一陷入困境的行业所面临的挑战。【原文：German Economy Minister Robert Habeck floated the idea of additional support for the country’s carmakers and will discuss ways to address the challenges facing the embattled sector in talks with executives on Monday in Berlin.】

item.title: 英镑触及两年高点后开始变得脆弱
item.description: 本周，英镑的反弹势头再次受到刺激，但摩根大通私人银行（J.P. Morgan Private Bank）、道富环球市场（State Street Global Markets）和杰富瑞（Jefferies）的策略师们表示，英镑的涨势正变得越来越脆弱。【原文：The pound’s peer-beating rally got a fresh spur this week, but strategists from J.P. Morgan Private Bank, State Street Global Markets and Jefferies say those gains are looking increasingly fragile.】

item.title: Raiffeisen 在出售白俄罗斯业务的交易中损失 8 亿欧元
item.description: 莱法森国际银行股份公司（Raiffeisen Bank International AG）同意出售其白俄罗斯分行，交易完成后将使其利润减少约 8 亿欧元（约合 8.93 亿美元）。【原文：Raiffeisen Bank International AG agreed to sell its Belarusian unit in a deal that will dent its profit by about €800 million ($893 million) at closing.】

item.title: 德国商业银行劳工代表认为三分之二的工作岗位面临风险
item.description: 德国商业银行股份公司（Commerzbank AG）的劳工代表 "坚决 "阻止与意大利竞争对手意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）的合并，并警告说该德国贷款机构三分之二的工作岗位可能会在收购中被裁减。【原文：Commerzbank AG’s labor representatives are “bitterly determined” to prevent a merger with Italian rival UniCredit SpA, warning that two-thirds of the jobs at the German lender could be cut in a takeover.】

item.title: 汉莎航空考虑在竞争中削减每日北京航班量
item.description: 德国汉莎航空公司（Deutsche Lufthansa AG）正在考虑是否削减每天从法兰克福飞往北京的航班，理由是无法与可以自由穿越俄罗斯领空的海湾航空公司竞争。【原文：Deutsche Lufthansa AG is reviewing whether to cut its daily flight from Frankfurt to Beijing, citing its inability to compete with Gulf airlines that are free to travel through Russian air space.】

item.title: 赛诺菲的多发性硬化症药物可减缓病情发展
item.description: 赛诺菲公司治疗一种多发性硬化症的实验性药物将残疾进展的时间推迟了近三分之一，为目前尚无治疗方法的患者带来了希望。【原文：Sanofi’s experimental drug for a form of multiple sclerosis delayed the progression of disability by nearly a third, providing hope for patients for whom there’s currently no treatment.】

item.title: Xbox 总裁谈掌上游戏机和订阅游戏
item.description:
莎拉-邦德（Sarah Bond）相对来说是个局外人，她正在领导一家落后于索尼和任天堂的公司进行高风险的转型。【原文：

A relative outsider, Sarah Bond is leading a high-stakes transformation of a company that’s lagging behind Sony and Nintendo.

】

item.title: 美银策略师哈特内特：泡沫风险回归，买入债券和黄金
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的迈克尔-哈特内特（Michael Hartnett）认为，美联储降息后股票市场的亢奋情绪正在煽起泡沫风险，使债券和黄金成为抵御任何经济衰退或通胀重现的诱人对冲工具。【原文：The euphoria in equity markets following the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cut is stoking the risk of a bubble, making bonds and gold an attractive hedge against any recession or renewed inflation, according to Bank of America Corp.’s Michael Hartnett.】

item.title: 以色列将战争焦点转向因寻呼机爆炸而被削弱的真主党
item.description: 以色列通过诱杀寻呼机和对讲机打击黎巴嫩和叙利亚境内真主党成员的行动已酝酿多年，而现在使用这些设备则加剧了旨在彻底瓦解该组织的高风险行动。【原文：Israel’s operation against Hezbollah members in Lebanon and Syria through booby-trapped pagers and walkie-talkies was years in the making, and its use now ramped up a high-risk campaign aimed at deeply disrupting the group.】

item.title: 俄罗斯利用黑名单油轮运输石油的速度正在加快
item.description: 越来越多因参与运输俄罗斯石油而受到制裁的油轮重新找到了工作；这对西方当局来说是一个打击，因为他们曾试图取缔这些船只，以打击莫斯科获得石油美元的机会。【原文：A growing number oil tankers that were sanctioned for their role in transporting Russian petroleum are finding work again — a blow to western authorities who sought to clamp down on the vessels in an effort to hurt Moscow’s access to petrodollars.】
